name: Beware of the Chicken
description:
SYNOPSIS

To save her life, Mother Hen sacrifices her unhatched unborn to destroy crazed roosters.

CONTROLS

Space: Fire

Up: Up Arrow

Down: Down Arrow

Left: Left Arrow

Right: Right Arrow

Esc: Quit

R: Restart

CREDITS

Game title/Cover  Image: Turtle Chan (turtlechan.deviantart.com)

Audio track: Iwan Gabovitch (http://qubodup.net)
